UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: Ponericins, new antibacterial and insecticidal peptides from the venom of the ant Pachycondyla goeldii.
Literature.Author: Orivel J, Redeker V, Le Caer JP, Krier F, Revol-Junelles AM, Longeon A, Chaffotte A, Dejean A, Rossier J

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Lactococcus lactis subsp. cremoris I116(MIC=4µM),Staphylococcus aureus CIP 677(MIC=8µM),Escherichia coli L-(no activity data),Klebsiella pneumoniae CIP 8291(no activity data),Proteus mirabilis LMA TP(no activity data),Salmonella enterica CIP 813(no activity data),Yersinia enterocolitica CIP 6529(no activity data),Elizabethkingia meningoseptica CIP 6057(no activity data),Pseudomonas putida LMA (no activity data),Aspergillus niger LMA 910(no activity data),Botrytis cinerea LMA 950(no activity data),Acheta domesticus(LD50=47.3nmol/g),Pachycondyla goeldii(LD50=176.5nmol/g)
